title: Apple is the new target for nonsense harassment by Trump’s regulators (but your news org could be next)
description: On Wednesday afternoon, Donald Trump’s head of the Federal Trade Commission, Andrew Ferguson, sent a ludicrous letter to Apple CEO Tim Cook, threatening to bring the hammer of the federal government down on the tech giant because he doesn’t like its morning email newsletter.
